name: Pork Sisig
description: This dish made from crispy and tender pieces of pork, perfectly seasoned with a savory blend of spices, onions, and chilies.

name: Fish Cake
description: This dish combines the delicate flavors of fish with a smoky, grilled finish.

name: Kimchi
description: Side dish that's the perfect balance of spicy, tangy, and umami.

name: Hotdog
description: Crispy on the outside while still juicy inside and grilling a hot dog alongside pork belly slices on a hot grill.

name: Cucumber
description: Salted briefly to remove excess moisture, giving the dish a crisp and crunchy texture that complements heavier main dishes like grilled meats or stews

name: Lettuce
description: The cool, crisp leaves are perfect for wrapping pork belly slices

name: Rice
description: This is a soft, fluffy grain. It's often served with a variety of dishes like curries, stews, or grilled meats.

name: Corn
description: Sweet and tender kernels, perfect as a side dish to accompany grilled meats and other dishes.

name: Korean Steam Egg
description: Made by steaming eggs with a few basic ingredients, resulting in a smooth, custard-like texture.
